headline: Capital One Financial (NYSE:COF) Launches Databolt to Enhance Data Security Solutions
summary: Capital One Financial (NYSE:COF) recently launched Capital One Databolt, a significant step in enhancing data security. Despite this innovation, the company saw its share price decline by 3% over the last month. This decrease aligns closely with the broader market trend, as the market dropped 3% during this period, primarily driven by volatility in tech sectors and global trade concerns. While the introduction of Databolt is a forward-looking measure with potential long-term benefits, it did...

headline: Capital One Software Unveils Capital One Databolt to Help Companies Tokenize Sensitive Data at Scale
summary: MCLEAN, Va., April 17, 2025--Capital One Software, the enterprise B2B software business of Capital One, today announced the launch of Capital One Databolt, a tokenization solution designed to help businesses address growing data security challenges. Databolt empowers companies to protect their most sensitive data at scale, without compromising speed or performance.

headline: 2 Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Hand Over Fist and 1 To Avoid
summary: The broader stock market may be experiencing turbulence, but Berkshire Hathaway remains a shining beacon of success.  Guided by the legendary Warren Buffett, this conglomerate continues to deliver for investors year after year.  Over the past 25 years, Berkshire Hathaway has achieved an impressive annualized return of 11.1% -- crushing the S&P 500, which has climbed around 7.2% annually during the same period.
